page.title: 08EDUCATION IN BEDWORTH
page.content: Education is provided in{FIRST SCHOOLS (5-8yrs){MIDDLE SCHOOLS}(8-12yrs) & { {COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS}(12-16yrs).Above this age there are other full time educational opportunities in Bedworth & Nuneaton.There are no comprehensive schools or beyond,in our area. Of interest is the number of church schools still in Bedworth.The Rev. Nicholas Chamberlaine (Bedworth Rector 1660-1715)died a rich man.He left his money to endow schools & a hospital (now the Almshouses).The five church schools open are Canon Maggs Middle School,Canon Evans First School, Hob Lane First School,Henry Bellairs Middle School & Bulkington Lane First School.Money from the endowment is still regularly granted for such things as purchasing computers & the building of a vandal-proof store to protect school textbooks.
